faq.title: What is Youtube Vanced?
faq.description:
YouTube Vanced is a modified version of YouTube with extra features to make your YouTube experience better!

Such features include:

Background playback, PiP, black theme, ads removal (can be configured in Vanced settings > Ads settings), override max resolution (allow playback of video with resolution higher than your screen) and much more!

For more information, visit <https://vancedapp.com>

faq.title: Where is the Download button?
faq.description:
Of course Google won't allow the modified version of its own apps to be on their store so don't look for it on Play Store, those are fake apps.

Vanced apps can be downloaded and installed using Vanced Manager which can be found on our official website: <https://vancedapp.com> but you can also grab it from Github: <https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest>

faq.title: Does YouTube Vanced auto-update?
faq.description:
No, it doesn't.

Vanced Manager will send you a notification when there is one.

You can also follow our [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/wYrRPgv) or [Telegram](https://t.me/Vanced) for latest news and update notices as well.

faq.title: Can Vanced download videos?
faq.description:
Vanced doesn't include video downloading feature and never will.

Many videos are available to download for free in selected coutries: <https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6141269>. For the rest of the world, please get YouTube Premium or use a 3rd party downloader.

Again, Vanced WILL NEVER add a video downloader to the app or anything similar.

This has been the reason for the shutdown of many YouTube mods in the past as Google doesn't like people downloading copyrighted contents from their platform so don't ask for it!!!

faq.title: Swipe gesture doesn't work?
faq.description: If you have comments shown at the bottom (old place) in Vanced settings > Layout settings, disable it and restart the app. If that doesnt work, force stop the app and clear its data.

faq.title: Captions not available?
faq.description: This is not an issue. Not all videos have caption.

faq.title: Do you take donations?
faq.description:
We DO NOT accept any sort of donations under any circumstances and any sites or links or posts that says "donate for vanced" is fake.

But if you want to support Vanced developers, you can download Brave using [this link](https://brave.com/kev231) and Adguard using [this link](https://adguard.com/en/welcome.html?aid=31141).

faq.title: Make the player layout hide automaticall?y
faq.description: You can configure it in YouTube Vanced Settings > Accessbility. If the settings fails to open or doesn't work, go to your device accessbility settings and disable sound amplifier, switch access, live caption.

faq.title: Why the split apks?
faq.description:
Because:

1. The stock app uses it so Vanced uses it too.

2. Because it uses less storage, you don't have to install the languages that you don't use.

3. We can converts it to normal .apk file but we are lazy so...


Don't worry though, Vanced Manager does all the hard work for you so just tap on the Install button.

faq.title: The colour in the startup screen is diffrent from the theme?
faq.description: The startup screen background color is taken from the Android framework colour to make sure it changes according to the system theme. You can use Substratum/Swift themes to change the colour.

faq.title: Should I redownload the installtion files?
faq.description: Files can be corrupted because of various reasons. To avoid this, you can choose to download it again to ensure your installation goes smoothly.

faq.title: The root version doesn't have Microphone permission?
faq.description: It does if your Vanced is up-to-date.

faq.title: What is Exoplayer v1?
faq.description: It's an older version of the current media player used by YouTube. You might get better performance and stability when using it.

faq.title: How to unlock Developer Options?
faq.description: In Vanced settings, tap on the "About" section 6-7 times to unlock it. This only enables the additional video codec settings.

faq.title: Issues with microG?
faq.description:
1. You need to have atleast Pico Gapps to run vanced.

2. You can’t run vanced with microG Core because it needs Google Play Services Framework which is available in all Gapps packages.

3. If you are worried about your privacy & don’t want to use Gapps but still want to use watch YouTube withou ads then the web version is always available.

faq.title: Chromecast doesn't work?
faq.description: It works if your microG is up-to-date.

faq.title: Apk Signing?
faq.description:
You are reading this because you are not using Vanced Manager. Use it!

Vanced Manager can be found at the official site: <https://vancedapp.com> or Github: <https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest>.

faq.title: YouTube Vanced is on Play Store?
faq.description:
Again, DO NOT install any fake apps named "YouTube Vanced" or similar on the Play Store or any app stores. This Vanced Guide is the only official app pulished on Play Store.

If you find any other app with our icon and name, report it to the store and give it bad review.

Our apps can only be found at <https://vancedapp.com>.

faq.title: Vanced isn't showing up in app drawer?
faq.description:
You are reading this because you are not using Vanced Manager. Use it!

Vanced Manager can be found at the official site: <https://vancedapp.com> or Github: <https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest>.

faq.title: Video isn't playing?
faq.description: Try restarting the app. It might also because of your internet or your device.

faq.title: All videos highest resolution is 480p?
faq.description: Due to the COVID-19, Google is restricting data usage of several coutries. This happens on the server and affect both Vanced and stock YouTube.

fields.title: Workarounds:
fields.content:
1) Connect to a VPN of a different region.

2) Watch on web interface.n
3) Since the 480p restriction is only for mobile devices and not tablets, you can change the device model in YouTube Vanced to overcome the restriction.

a) Open YouTube Vanced.

b) Enable additional options by going to Settings -> Vanced Settings -> Tap on the About section till you get a message saying hidden Menu is visible.

c) Go to Codec override and set model to "SM-T865" and device to "Samsung".

d) Restart the app and the 480p limit should be gone.

faq.title: Hide microG notification?
faq.description:
To hide microG notification, disable battery optimisation for microG and reboot your device.

If the notification is still there after reboot, disable microG notification by holding on the notification, toggle it off and tap Save.

faq.title: Does higher resolution looks any better?
faq.description:
Yes, but only if the video ratio is something like 18:9, 21:9, ... You can enable Stats for nerds in Settings > General to confirm it.

To enable higher resolutions, go to Vanced settings > Video settings and turn on "Max resolution" then restart the app.
